alert.note: Alert for Charles City; City of Newport News; City of Williamsburg; Isle of Wight; James City; Prince George; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:57PM EDT until June 16 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Charles City County in east central Virginia... Northern Isle of Wight County in southeastern Virginia... Northeastern Prince George County in south central Virginia... West central York County in southeastern Virginia... The northern City of Newport News in southeastern Virginia... Southern James City County in southeastern Virginia... Northern Surry County in southeastern Virginia... The City of Williamsburg in southeastern Virginia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 357 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Claremont, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rustic around 400 PM EDT. Claremont around 405 PM EDT. Surry around 415 PM EDT. Scotland and Jamestown around 420 PM EDT. College Of William And Mary and Kings Point around 425 PM EDT. Carver Gardens and York Terrace around 430 PM EDT. Busch Gardens and Grove around 435 PM EDT. Fort Eustis around 440 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rushmere, Taylors Corner, Chippokes State Park, Water Country U.S.A., Spring Grove, Brandon, Bacons Castle, Poolesville, Governors Land and Hog Island Game Reserve. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; City of Newport News; City of Williamsburg; Isle of Wight; James City; Prince George; Surry; York
